titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Vito Jesus Valdez papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Mexican American artist from Michigan. Valdez worked as an independent artist in Monteral and was artist-in-residence in Belgium. He later worked on community art projects in the Detroit Windsor area.
archdesc.scopecontent: Biographical information, catalogs, notices of gallery receptions for the opening of exhibitions, workshop programs, other publications, scanned copies of family photographs, posters announcing exhibitions of art work, and prints, negatives, and contact sheets of Valdez's model.
